QAConfig.line: RT Poultry Breeder Layer Inspection Checklist

head.title: RT Poultry Breeder Layer Inspection Checklist

standard.nc: PLEASE NOTE, YOU CAN NOW SEND PHOTOGRAPHIC EVIDENCE TO THE FOLLOWING NUMBER 07561391543. PLEASE ENSURE THAT YOU INCLUDE YOUR REFERENCE NUMBER WITH ALL PHOTOGRAPHS
All non-conformances must be recififed within 28 days from the date of the inspection.

I acknowledge that the inspector has carried out an inspection and has brought to my attention areas where non-conformances have been identified. I understand that these inspection results are provided for information only at this stage. This report does not indicate wether or not I will be awarded a certificate.

field.title: House 1 Total Wt Females (kg)
field.calc: House 1 No. Females*House 1 Ave. Wt Females (kg)

field.title: House 1 Total Wt Males (kg)
field.calc: House 1 No. Males*House 1 Ave. Wt Males (kg)

field.title: House 1 Total Wt Birds (kg)
field.calc: House 1 Total Wt Females (kg)+House 1 Total Wt Males (kg)

field.title: House 1 Stocking Density (kg/Sqm)
field.calc: ROUND(((House 1 Total Wt Birds (kg))*1.00/House 1 Floor space (sqm)),2)

field.title: House 2 Total Wt Females (kg)
field.calc: House 2 No. Females*House 2 Ave. Wt Females (kg)

field.title: House 2 Total Wt Males (kg)
field.calc: House 2 No. Males*House 2 Ave. Wt Males (kg)

field.title: House 2 Total Wt Birds (kg)
field.calc: House 2 Total Wt Females (kg)+House 2 Total Wt Males (kg)

field.title: House 2 Stocking Density (kg/Sqm)
field.calc: ROUND(((House 2 Total Wt Birds (kg))*1.00/House 2 Floor space (sqm)),2)

field.title: House 3 Total Wt Females (kg)
field.calc: House 3 No. Females*House 3 Ave. Wt Females (kg)

field.title: House 3 Total Wt Males (kg)
field.calc: House 3 No. Males*House 3 Ave. Wt Males (kg)

field.title: House 3 Total Wt Birds (kg)
field.calc: House 3 Total Wt Females (kg)+House 3 Total Wt Males (kg)

field.title: House 3 Stocking Density (kg/Sqm)
field.calc: ROUND(((House 3 Total Wt Birds (kg))*1.00/House 3 Floor space (sqm)),2)

field.title: House 4 Total Wt Females (kg)
field.calc: House 4 No. Females*House 4 Ave. Wt Females (kg)

field.title: House 4 Total Wt Males (kg)
field.calc: House 4 No. Males*House 4 Ave. Wt Males (kg)

field.title: House 4 Total Wt Birds (kg)
field.calc: House 4 Total Wt Females (kg)+House 4 Total Wt Males (kg)

field.title: House 4 Stocking Density (kg/Sqm)
field.calc: ROUND(((House 4 Total Wt Birds (kg))*1.00/House 4 Floor space (sqm)),2)

field.title: 1. I confirm that all the information given in this document is correct to the best of my knowledge.
2. I agree to abide by the Red Tractor Assurance (RTA) Poultry Scheme Product Standard and Rules and NIFCC Scheme Operating Procedures.
3. I agree to the details contained in this inspection report being divulged to RTA.
4. I agree to inform Northern Ireland Food Chain Certification of any changes in my circumstances to those declared in this document.
